## common.getWorkspaceById() function

Find the workspace with the specified ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getWorkspaceById(id: string): Workspace | null;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | ID of workspace to find. |

<b>Returns:</b>
